desc: The Cage™ Permanent Hub Blind, the first permanent portable hub blind, is designed to withstand the elements for years out in the field.

layout.text: BUILT STOUT AND MADE TO LEAVE OUT

Most hunters have left a portable blind out for too long only to return to a collapsed, faded, and likely damaged blind. The CAGE™ Permanent Hub Blind — the first permanent portable hub blind — is designed to withstand the elements for years out in the field.
